suite.name: SL TS1 Login

kw.name: SSU_Open_Automation_Browser
kw.doc: This custom keyword opens an automation browser, navigtes to the target URL, then maximizes the browser window.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: SL_TS1TC001

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: SS01_Capture_Element
kw.doc: This custom keyword screen captures a specific element.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot
kw.doc: Captures a screenshot from the element identified by ``locator`` and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: SS02_Capture_Full_Page_Showing_Element
kw.doc: This custom keyword scroll to the target element and screen captures a full page.

kw.name: Scroll Element Into View
kw.doc: Scrolls the element identified by ``locator`` into view.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

test.doc: Test Case ID: SL_TS1TC001 Test Case Description: Verify if Login header is visible. Pre-Requisites: - URL: https://www.saucedemo.com Test Steps: 1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com. 2. Verify if Login header is visible. Post-Requisite: - Login Header should be visible.

test.name: SL_TS1TC002

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'class:login_logo' contains exact text 'Swag Labs'.

test.doc: Test Case ID: SL_TS1TC002 Test Case Description: Verify if Login header text is "Swag Labs". Pre-Requisites: - URL: https://www.saucedemo.com Test Steps: 1. Navigate to https://www.saucedemo.com. 2. Verify if Login header text is "Swag Labs". Post-Requisite: - Login Header text should be "Swag Labs".

test.doc: Test Case ID: SL_TS1TC005 Test Case Description: Verify if Username field placeholder text is "Username". Pre-Requisites: - URL: https://www.saucedemo.com Test Steps: 1.
